abstract: Sprint Nextel and Clearwire are close to announcing the formation of a WiMax joint venture with funds provided in part by a $2 billion injection from Intel, TheStreet.com reported.
lead_paragraph: Sprint Nextel and Clearwire are close to announcing the formation of a WiMax joint venture with funds provided in part by a $2 billion injection from Intel, TheStreet.com reported.

headline.main: Intel Said to Invest in WiMax Venture
